did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Information Center printed materials 1971-2000
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Established in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. The Chicago Office opened in 1891. The Information Center served as a corporate research library and reference center for the agency. Collection spans the years 1971-2000 and consists largely of trade publications produced by commercial publishers, academic institutions, professional associations and market research firms. Publications address a broad range of market sectors, product categories, demographics and consumer behaviors. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48-hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Information Center Printed Materials, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The J. Walter Thompson Company. Chicago Office. Information Center Printed Materials were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed: materials may not have been ordered and described beyond their original condition.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection spans the years 1971-2000 and consists largely of trade publications produced by commercial publishers, academic institutions, professional associations and market research firms. Publications address a broad range of market sectors, product categories, demographics and consumer behaviors.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is minimally processed, with little re-arranging beyond the order of accessioning.
